title: Elon Musk Calls ESG ‘An Outrageous Scam’ After Tesla Was Removed From Index
sub_head: Tesla CEO says S&P has ‘lost their integrity’; S&P cites Tesla’s carbon strategy, working conditions and claims of racial discrimination for removal
body:
Tesla Inc. was recently dropped from an equity index that tracks environmental, social and governance principles.
Elon Musk isn’t pleased.
